00031 
00032 class Random
00033 {
00034     public:
00035 
00036     static void initialize();               // initialize the randomizer
00037     static double real(double a, double b); // random double in [a,b)
00038     static int integer(int a, int b);       // random int in [a,b)
00039     static double gaussian(double sd);      // random gaussian w/deviation sd
00040 };
